name: Dontate MITCHELL, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Mitchell v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Dontate MITCHELL, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 9th day of January, 2012, the Application for Leave to File Original Process and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus are GRANTED. The Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County is directed to dispose of Petitioner’s motion for credit for time served within 60 days.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
35 A.3d 3
Dontate MITCHELL, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.
No. 97 EM 2011.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 9, 2012.
